content: get to the front panels half_double_crochet in two stitches in a row then skip one around you should end up with about 95 half_double_crochet there are 168 total stitches the exact amount of stitches no longer matters for the rest of the pattern slip_stitch to close do not turn row 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to close do not turn now you will create the groove for the waist tie by crocheting in the same row twice once in the rear loops and once in the front loops row 3 chain 3 double_crochet in the rear loop of each stitch around do not close do not turn set this yarn to the side waist ties on each side attach white yarn to the 8th double_crochet from the center and chain 20 tie off row 4 pick up your yarn from row 3 double_crochet in the front loop of each stitch from row 2 around pulling the tie on each side out to the front between the 2nd and 3rd dcs slip_stitch to close lay your elastic in the groove between the rear loop dcs and the front loop dcs and sew the elastic into a circle row 5 single_crochet around crocheting through the top of the rear loop dcs and the front loop dcs to connect them tie off and work away ends whoa you did it jump up and down and celebrate please don t copy or distribute this pattern without my consent you can do anything you want with your finished work of course i d love if you d share pictures of your finished work with me on ravelry beebli or instagram @petrichorcrochet
